header: Take Your Disputes With Brothers To Wise Judges In The Church, Not To The World’s Courts

verse: Does any one of you, having a matter against the other, dare to go-to-court before the unrighteous ones, and not before the saints?
Or do you not know that the saints will judge the world? And if the world is judged by you, are you unworthy of the smallest cases?
Do you not know that we will judge angels? Shall I not-indeed mention things-pertaining-to-this-life?
So indeed, if you have cases pertaining-to-this-life, are you seating these [as judges]— the ones having been of-no-account in the church?
I say this to your shame. So is there not among you anyone wise who will be able to discern between his brother and this brother?—
but brother is going-to-court against brother, and this before unbelievers?

header: Better To Be Wronged Than To Wrong Your Brother With a Lawsuit

verse: So indeed, it is already actually a defeat for you that you have lawsuits with each other. Why not rather be wronged? Why not rather be defrauded?
But you are wronging and defrauding— and this [your own] brothers!

header: Wrongdoers Will Not Inherit The Kingdom. But You Were Cleansed of Such Things

verse: Or do you not know that wrongdoers will not inherit God’s kingdom? Do not be deceived. Neither sexually-immoral ones, nor idolaters, nor adulterers, nor homo-erotic-partners, nor homosexuals,
nor thieves, nor greedy ones— not drunkards, not revilers, not swindlers— will inherit the kingdom of God.
And some of you were these things. But you washed-them-away, but you were sanctified, but you were declared-righteous in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ and in the Spirit of our God.
“All things are lawful to me”, but not all things are beneficial. “All things are lawful to me”, but I will not be mastered by any.
Foods are for the stomach and the stomach for foods. But God will do-away-with both this and these. But the body is not for sexual-immorality, but for the Lord, and the Lord is for the body.
And God both raised the Lord and will raise us up by His power.

header: Your Bodies Are Body-Parts of Christ: Flee Sexual Immorality

verse: Do you not know that your bodies are body-parts of Christ? Therefore, having taken-away the body-parts of Christ, shall I make them body-parts of a prostitute? May it never be!
Or do you not know that the one joining himself to a prostitute is one body with her? For He says [in Gen 2:24] “the two will be one flesh”.
But the one joining himself to the Lord is one spirit with Him.
Be fleeing sexual immorality.

header: Your Body Is The Temple of The Holy Spirit. Glorify God In Your Body

verse: Or do you not know that your body is the temple of the Holy Spirit in you, Whom you have from God? And you are not your own,
for you were bought with a price. Therefore glorify God in your body.
